long_description: The Light My Fire Pack-Up-Cup(TM) takes next-to-no space in your bag and then unfolds to hold 8.8 fl. oz. of your favorite beverage when you get to camp. Flexible base is made from polyethylene while the rigid upper part and top are made from polypropylene. Tight and secure sip-through lid keeps your beverage warm and protects it from dirt. Internal measuring lines help you measure out liquids when you're preparing meals. Weighs only 1.9 oz. Light My Fire Pack-Up-Cup(TM) is dishwasher and microwave safe.
short_description: The Light My Fire Pack-Up-Cup(TM) takes next-to-no space in your bag and then unfolds to hold 8.8 fl. oz. of your favorite beverage when you get to camp.
